Tanks

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    The Bullet class represents a projectile fired by tanks in the game. Bullets travel with a certain velocity and angle, causing damage upon impact with terrain or tanks.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • x

        public float x

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(float x,
              float y,
              float power,
              float angle,
              int[] terrain,
              java.lang.String color,
              java.util.ArrayList<Tank> tanks,
              int bulletID,
              int wind)
        Constructs a new Bullet object with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial X-coordinate of the bullet.
        y - The initial Y-coordinate of the bullet.
        power - The power of the bullet, influencing its velocity.
        angle - The angle at which the bullet is fired.
        terrain - The terrain information.
        color - The color of the bullet.
        tanks - The list of all tanks in the game.
        bulletID - The unique ID of the bullet.
        wind - The wind speed affecting the bullet's trajectory.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Updates the state of the bullet for each game tick.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the bullet on the screen.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.

      • isOffScreen

        public boolean isOffScreen()
        Checks if the bullet has gone off-screen.
        Returns:
        True if the bullet is off-screen, otherwise false.

      • hasHitGround

        public boolean hasHitGround()
        Checks if the bullet has hit the ground.
        Returns:
        True if the bullet has hit the ground, otherwise false.

      • explode

        public void explode(int x,
                    int y)
        Initiates an explosion at the bullet's position upon impact. The explosion affects nearby terrain and tanks.
        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate of the explosion point.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the explosion point.

      • updateTankHealth

        public void updateTankHealth(int x,
                             int y)
        Updates the health of tanks affected by the explosion.
        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate of the explosion point.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the explosion point.

      • dist

        public float dist(int x1,
                  int y1,
                  int x2,
                  int y2)
        Calculates the distance between two points.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The X-coordinate of the first point.
        y1 - The Y-coordinate of the first point.
        x2 - The X-coordinate of the second point.
        y2 - The Y-coordinate of the second point.
        Returns:
        The distance between the points.

        public int getScore()
